text: Dayton Hollis Waller, Jr. (April 2, 1925 - May 26, 2015) was an American farmer and businessman from Shreveport, Louisiana. He was a Democratic member of the Louisiana House of Representatives. He served a single term with six other at-large members from 1968 until 1972. ==References== Category:1925 births Category:2015 deaths Category:American Baptists Category:Businesspeople from Shreveport, Louisiana Category:Politicians from Shreveport, Louisiana Category:Democratic Party (United States) politicians
title: Dayton Waller
